content.raw: There should be some consideration for the condition where the filter refers to chromosomes/regions not found in the genomedata archive. Currently it will raise a KeyError (e.g. "KeyError: 'Could not find chromosome: chr10'") if a chromosome in the filter is not found in the archive.
content.html: There should be some consideration for the condition where the filter refers to chromosomes/regions not found in the genomedata archive. Currently it will raise a KeyError (e.g. "KeyError: 'Could not find chromosome: chr10'") if a chromosome in the filter is not found in the archive.
